explains: v. 诊断（病症）；找出原因

sentences.en: The test is used to diagnose a variety of diseases.
sentences.cn: 此项化验可用于诊断多种疾病。

sentences.en: Some other symptoms would also help doctors diagnose AIDS patients.
sentences.cn: 其他一些症状也有助于医生诊断出艾滋病患者。

sentences.en: Some psychologists do use their field's version of color theory to diagnose and treat patients.
sentences.cn: 一些心理学家确实用他们领域的色彩理论来诊断和治疗病人。
